data.title: Brown University Athletics
data.meta_description: Nicholas BrownBack, IM, Fly - 2018-19: Was a member of the 400 medley relay team that broke the school record at the Ivy League Championships ... Finished ni...
data.text:
2018-19: Was a member of the 400 medley relay team that broke the school record at the Ivy League Championships ... Finished ninth in the 200 backstroke, 12th in the 100 butterfly and 13th in the 50 freestyle at Ivies ... Won the 50 freestyle and 200 backstroke against Cornell ... Also finished third in the 100 backstroke versus the Big Red ... Took first in the 200 backstroke and third in the 100 backstroke at Columbia ... Placed second in the 200 backstroke against Harvard and Penn ... Appeared in four meets for the Bears.

2017-18: Competed in all five meets on the season ... Finished third in the 200 backstroke at Cornell ... Placed fourth in both the 200 backstroke and 100 butterfly against Columbia ... Came in second in both the 100 and 200 backstroke versus MIT ... Placed second in the 200 backstroke and fourth in the 100 backstroke at Yale.

2016-17: Finished 11th in the 200 backstroke, 12th in the 100 backstroke and 16th in the 100 butterfly at the Ivy League Championships ... Recorded his top finishes against Cornell in the 100 backstroke and the 200 backstroke, placing second and third, respectively ... Competed in all six meets on the season.

2015-16: Recorded his best times in the 200 IM (1:50.18), 200 backstroke (1:47.07), 100 backstroke (49.07) at the Ivy League Championships … Member of the 400 freestyle relay team that finished first against Columbia … Also finished second in the 200 backstroke and third in the 100 backstroke versus Columbia … Set a new personal best in the 50 freestyle against UMass with a time of 23. 89, good for second-place … Also appeared in meets versus Dartmouth/Princeton, Harvard/Penn and Cornell.

Before Brown: Qualified for nationals … Earned Scholastic All-America honors as a junior and senior … Finished career with a New England record … Swam for head coach Chuck Batchelor … Competed on the club level for Bluefish Swim Club … National Merit Commended Scholar and high honor roll student.

Personal: Nicholas is the son of Tracy and James Brown … Has two siblings, Brandon and Courtney … Born on July 16, 1996 … Concentrating in Economics and English.
